rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable BE.BESEQ

datasetVariables.description: Sequence number to ensure uniqueness of records within a dataset for a subject. May be any valid number (including decimals) and does not have to start at 1.
datasetVariables.label: Sequence Number
datasetVariables.name: BESEQ

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable BE.BEGRPID

datasetVariables.description: Optional group identifier, used to link together a block of related records within a subject in a domain.
datasetVariables.label: Group ID
datasetVariables.name: BEGRPID

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable BE.BEREFID

datasetVariables.description: Internal or external identifier for the specimen affected or created by the event.

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable BE.BESPID

datasetVariables.name: BESPID

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable BE.BETERM

self.title: Reported Term for the Biospecimen Event

datasetVariables.name: BETERM

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable BE.BEMODIFY

datasetVariables.description: If the value for BETERM is modified for coding purposes, then the modified text is placed here.

datasetVariables.name: BEDECOD

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable BE.BECAT

datasetVariables.description: Used to define a category of topic-variable values. Example: COLLECTION, PREPARATION, TRANSPORT.
datasetVariables.label: Category for Biospecimen Event
datasetVariables.name: BECAT

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable BE.BESCAT

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable BE.BELOC

datasetVariables.description: Describes the anatomical location relevant for the event (e.g. BRAIN, LUNG).
datasetVariables.label: Anatomical Location of Event
datasetVariables.name: BELOC

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable BE.BEPARTY

datasetVariables.description: Party accountable for the transferable object (e.g. specimen) as a result of the activity performed in the associated BETERM variable. The party could be an individual (e.g., subject), an organization (e.g., sponsor), or a location that is a proxy for an individual or organization (e.g., site). It is usually a somewhat general term that is further identified in the BEPRTYID variable.
datasetVariables.label: Accountable Party
datasetVariables.name: BEPARTY

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable BE.BEPRTYID

datasetVariables.description: Identification of the specific party accountable for the transferable object (e.g. Specimen) after the action in BETERM is taken. Used in conjunction with BEPARTY.
datasetVariables.label: Identification of Accountable Party
datasetVariables.name: BEPRTYID

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable BE.VISITNUM

datasetVariables.label: Visit Number
datasetVariables.name: VISITNUM

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable BE.VISIT

datasetVariables.name: VISITDY

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable BE.BEDUR

datasetVariables.description: Collected duration and unit of a biospecimen event. Used only if collected on the CRF and not derived from start and end date/times. Example: P1DT2H (for 1 day, 2 hours).
datasetVariables.label: Duration of Biospecimen Event
datasetVariables.name: BEDUR

description: An events domain that documents actions taken that affect or may affect a specimen (e.g., specimen collection, freezing and thawing, aliquoting, transportation).
label: Biospecimen Events
name: BE
